tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WasteProduction (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    process_id INT NOT NULL,
    waste_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE sustainability_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    process_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES biofuel_process(process_id)
);
